tweets.text:
April is #CitizenScienceMonth 
üìÖ Our upcoming #SmartRural event on #water features Guy Pluckwell from the @EnvAgency talking about #CitizenScience and the positive impact it has had on Shropshire's rivers. Want to know more? Join us on April 28th https://t.co/Y60JzVcHuT

Hope everyone had a good Easter breaküê£

Last week we visited one of our exciting projects over at Brandon Staunch and here are some drone shots of the fish pass being built.

For more information about the project click here:
https://t.co/fyp2irA6bC

@EnvAgency @HeritageFundM_E https://t.co/orVqsN7ypv

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe In agreement with the regulator ?
@kittykatrollins Please ring our 24 hr number 0800 807060. Thanks
I would have thought @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA would be all over this clear case of breaching regulations about sewage discharges in exceptional circumstances. https://t.co/NY9bqyWcog
@EnvAgencyAnglia look at this river improved https://t.co/7uN24ZRJbp
@xrunnerwill @DCfieldteamsEA @EnvAgencySW Looks Fab Will. Is that a happy TL I see in the background? üòä

We have planted 25 trees along the River Stourüå≥

This is part of our finishing touches to the river restoration project we did there.

Read more: https://t.co/3uE4dj44Di
#Trees #Essex https://t.co/r6z7aQfXS3

BLOG POST: What do new #planning proposals on flooding and coastal change mean? by @theplanorak  - read the full post at https://t.co/hmZ7tHlQ8u
#ClimateAction @EnvAgency #flooding @uniofbrighton https://t.co/Czcy7lYDS7

New investigation - @EnvAgency (body in charge of monitoring chemical pollution in England) has pension funds with millions of pounds invested in agrochemical giants that make toxic pesticides (including some that are banned in UK) #divest https://t.co/NTgPkLzblb
@numenini @GlavenEel @froglifers @OuseEcologyEA @EnvAgencyAnglia You'd think otter.

Working alongside our partners, the fantastic natural #flood risk management scheme at Smithills #Bolton continues to make excellent progress! This week large stone dams have been installed to #slowtheflow & work with the peatland restoration project to enhance our environment https://t.co/NBL4rwIY4d

A few images of the üî•in Balby that @SYFR crews, officers and control staff have dealt with since last night. A great team effort supported by our key partners @syptweet @MyDoncaster @PHE_uk @YorksAmbulance @EnvAgencyYNE. Another protracted and challenging job https://t.co/raErlWUIw7

We‚Äôve been contacted by a team working on a documentary for ITV on how #flooding has affected the UK. They are keen to receive footage from people‚Äôs phones that show what #floods look like/ how people experience them. Anything used will be credited; if you can help get in touch! https://t.co/hv6eU0tmxD
